about: Originally from Austria, Cristina Coellen is a multimedia journalist with a lot of love for all things video.<break /><break />She has graduated from <bold>Durham University (UK)</bold> with an undergraduate degree in French and History and from <bold>Sciences Po Paris</bold> with a Master’s in Journalism and International Security.<break /><break />During her journalistic training, she notably worked for the German newspaper <bold>Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung</bold>, the video department of the French magazine <bold>Le Nouvel Obs</bold> and the evening news show of Franco-German TV channel <bold>ARTE</bold>.<break /><break />She has also freelanced for a variety of media, among which <bold>Slate</bold>, <bold>New Eastern Europe Magazine</bold>, <bold>Vorarlberger Nachrichten</bold> an <bold>Are We Europe</bold>.<break /><break />She is currently working a <bold>Euronews</bold> as a digital video producer.
